amendment.description: An amendment numbered 53 printed in Part A of House Report 118-602 to prevent funds from being used to transfer or delegate control or maintenance responsibility of the Lower Yellowstone Fish Bypass Channel to any non-Federal entity.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rosendale amendment (A028) Agreed to by recorded vote: 218 - 204 (Roll no. 374).

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Rosendale amendment (A028) Agreed to by recorded vote: 218 - 204 (Roll no. 374).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
